welcome.title: Welcome to Inglis Dominion
welcome.p1: Inglis Dominion is an independent payment network that allows financial institutions, businesses, and companies to issue their own virtual and physical payment cards.
welcome.p2: By continuing, you acknowledge that you have read and accepted our <0>Terms of Use</0> and our <1>Privacy Policy</1>, which governs the use of your personal and corporate information.
